title: Replay Tool
body: Hi, whats the name of the replay tool that lets you Zoom in  very much or zoom out? Also is it considered as an unaproved 3rd party app?

replies.body: We don't have any features that allow for a zoom in or out of the game.  It sounds like a third party program which is not something we support.  It also sounds like something that can give an unfair advantage in-game, so it can result in getting your account suspended.  Make sure to check out our[ third party programs ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848)guide for more info.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I'm talking  about the Skin Spotlight Replay Tool, is it unaproved? Because i want to do Cinematics ( like for example PeacePigeon ) So is it unaproved? Because it doesn,t
interfere directly with the in-game player experience, from when you press “Play” to the end-of-game screen. It just let you zoom in and out in The Replay, not in the actual game

We have no approved or officially supported third party applications.  While we may not suspend a player for using a certain application, it doesn't mean that can't change in the future.  We also wouldn't be able to help if you run into any tech problems as a result of using it.  Just be extra careful, as one may never now of any malicious content hiding within.  Be wary!
